name: Dr. Emily Harper
bio: Dr. Harper has over 10 years of experience designing and fitting custom winter clothing for dogs and cats. She ensures every pet stays warm and stylish during the cold months.

name: Liam Chen
bio: Liam specializes in seasonal grooming techniques and paw protection treatments to prevent dryness and cracking during harsh winters.

name: Sofia Martinez
bio: Sofia designs heated and orthopedic pet beds that maintain the perfect temperature balance for cats and small dogs throughout winter.

name: Dr. Rajiv Malhotra
bio: A certified pet nutritionist focused on developing winter diet plans that enhance immunity, coat health, and overall warmth in pets.

name: Ava Thompson
bio: Ava has years of experience handling winter walks safely, ensuring pets stay active with proper winter gear and short outdoor sessions.

name: Noah Bennett
bio: Noah provides professional installation and inspection of heated pet cabins, ensuring your furry friends stay cozy and safe all winter long.
